Description:
Contribute to increasing company profits through fruitful customer relationships.
Search for new prospect customers in the defined territory which includes existing accounts and new accounts.
Ensure achievement of all sales target and analyses all company objectives.
Manage typical conversion rate, sales call, revenue, and other reports in a precise manner for accurate evaluation.
Ensure dynamic communication with clients through online and offline modes, thereby promoting company products and services.
Leveraging different promotional modes like traditional marketing, social media, email marketing, etc., to advertise the company's products.Skills
Skills:
Qualifications-Has experience on working with DIALux, AutoCAD, and Adobe Animate
Is passionate on Lighting Designs
Excellent verbal and written communication skills-Prior experience in sales (preferably in the lighting industry).
Strong negotiation skills.
Salary varies based on skills and experience.
WFH/Remote set up, may be required to work onsite at times.
Working Schedule in UAE time Monday to Friday 9:00am-1:00pm, 1:30pm-6:30pm
Fluent Arabic Speakers in Riyadh only. CVs submitted in Arabic will not be considered.
If you meet the above requirements and are passionate about the lighting industry, please apply for the position today!
